name: promptpilot-pro
description: AI-powered prompt engineering and workflow automation platform

scripts.install:all: npm install && npm run install:backend && npm run install:frontend
scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.lint: npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:frontend
scripts.lint:fix: npm run lint:fix:backend && npm run lint:fix:frontend
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.test:unit: npm run test:unit:backend && npm run test:unit:frontend
scripts.test:all: npm run test:unit && npm run test:integration && npm run test:e2e
scripts.db:setup: cd backend && npm run db:generate && npm run db:push
scripts.setup: npm run install:all && npm run db:setup && npm run setup:hooks
scripts.prepush: npm run lint && npm run test
scripts.ci: npm run lint && npm run build && npm run test:all
scripts.clean: npm run clean:backend && npm run clean:frontend && npm run clean:deps
scripts.clean:backend: cd backend && rm -rf dist node_modules || rmdir /s /q dist node_modules
scripts.clean:frontend: cd frontend && rm -rf dist node_modules || rmdir /s /q dist node_modules
